General.Name: Enertime SAS
General.Description: Enertime SA designs, develops, and implements organic rankine cycle modules to produce renewable or CO2-free electricity from heat. The company also develops high temperature, heat pumps, gas expanders, and turbomachinery. It serves waste heat recovery, geothermal, waste-to-energy, district heating, and oil and gas industries. Enertime SA was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Courbevoie, France.
General.Address: 1, rue du Moulin des BruyEres, Courbevoie, France, 92400
